strings.name: PoliMappers
strings.description: YouthMappers chapter at Politecnico di Milano
strings.extendedDescription: PoliMappers is a volunteer studentsâ€™ association based at Politecnico di Milano. The mission of the group is to train and motivate the next generation of volunteer mappers and to do mapping using free and open source software within the university as well as primary and secondary schools.
